participant_1.background:
I enjoy playing with my cats to make myself feel younger.
I have enough money for my needs and wants.
i wear contacts.
i have found other pretty good blogs to share opinions with.
i have a sleeve of tattoos.

participant_2.background:
I am a biker who likes Toyota cars and wears lots of leather.
I am not close with my family and I prefer to spend time alone.
I was raised in a small town where the people were friendly and the food was delicious.
I try to do my laundry every week, but it doesn't always happen.
my eyes are brown.

content.text: Green! It just feels so refreshing and natural to me.
Cool, my favorite color is blue.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love playing with my cats! They make me laugh and smile.
Aww! I wish I had a cat! I love animals, but I don't have the time or space for one right now.
I understand. They can be a lot of work! What do you do for work?
I'm a biker! I love riding my bike and exploring new places.
That sounds really fun! I wish I could bike, but I have a bad back.
I'm sorry to hear that. Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to write in my journal and read. I also like to play video games.
I love to read too! I'm currently reading a book about the history of motorcycles.
Oh that sounds really interesting! I've never been much of a history buff, but I might have to check that out.
It's really good! I'm learning a lot about the early days of motorcycling.
